title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, a versatile and ergonomic mouse designed for both left-handed and right-handed users. This high-quality mouse offers smooth and precise tracking, making it perfect for everyday use and professional tasks.

Key Features:
- Trackball Design: The Trackman Marble features a trackball instead of a traditional mouse, providing precise and accurate cursor control.
- Side-to-Side Scrolling: With the side-to-side scrolling feature, you can easily navigate through documents and websites.
- Two Buttons: The mouse is equipped with two buttons for easy and efficient navigation.
- Connectivity Options: The Trackman Marble supports both PS/2 and USB connectivity options, giving you flexibility in how you connect it to your device.
- DPI: The mouse has a DPI of 300, ensuring smooth and responsive tracking.
- Colors: Available in red, gray, and white, you can choose the color that best suits your style.
- Dimensions: The mouse has a length of 7 inches, height of 2.5 inches, and width of 4 inches, providing a comfortable and ergonomic grip.

This Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is suitable for both left-handed and right-handed users, making it a versatile choice for anyone. It is made with high-quality materials and manufactured in China, ensuring durability and reliability.

Upgrade your mouse experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse.

Product Listing:

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, the perfect accessory for any computer setup. This trackball mouse offers a unique and ergonomic design that provides comfort and precision for all your computing needs.

Key Features:
- Trackball Technology: The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse features a built-in trackball, allowing for smooth and accurate cursor control. Say goodbye to traditional mouse scrolling and experience a new way to navigate your computer.
- Side-to-Side Scrolling: With the side-to-side scrolling feature, you can easily navigate through documents, web pages, and more with just a flick of your finger. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and make your browsing experience more efficient.
- Two Buttons: The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is equipped with two buttons, providing a simple and intuitive way to interact with your computer. Whether you're clicking, dragging, or selecting, these buttons offer a responsive and reliable performance.
- Connectivity Options: This trackball mouse offers both PS/2 and USB connectivity options, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of devices. Simply choose the connection type that suits your needs and enjoy seamless connectivity.
- DPI: The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse offers a DPI (dots per inch) rating of 300, providing precise tracking and smooth cursor movement. Whether you're working on detailed tasks or playing games, this mouse delivers accuracy and responsiveness.
- Colors: Available in red, gray, and white, you can choose the color that matches your style and preferences. Add a touch of personalization to your workspace with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse.
- Dimensions: With a length of 7 inches, a height of 2.5 inches, and a width of 4 inches, this trackball mouse offers a compact and ergonomic design. It fits comfortably in your hand, allowing for extended use without discomfort.

Suitability:
- Left-handed and Right-handed: The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is suitable for both left-handed and right-handed individuals, providing a comfortable and customizable experience for all users.

Origin Country:
- Made in China: This product is manufactured in China, ensuring high-quality craftsmanship and attention to detail.

Upgrade your computing experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. With its innovative features, comfortable design, and reliable performance, this trackball mouse is a must-have for any computer user. Order yours today and take your productivity to new heights.
